attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.review: the app took weeks to download😩i couldn't do anything on my phone while it downloaded and when it finally downloaded it gave my phone a virus😭i don't know who but someone was controlling my phone, opening apps, texting, calling, etc.! after all of the texts and calls an anonymous person did a GUN came through my phone and shot my entire family!!😡 then someone came through my phone and took everything out of my house! clothing, furniture, food, etc.🤬the anonymous person used a caller which brought wild rats, mice, skunks, possums, etc. i deleted the app when i finally had control which was 6 months!!🤬🤬 i finally deleted it and i will never download again!!

attributes.title: One of the worst apps in history because it’s about the disgusting orange face

Barron and Melania  is being controlled by Trump and I think that’s the most disgusting thing he has done.... so, I bet you to not use this app at all, he uses our information and my friend’s address is in Trump’s hands, so please, do not vote for trump and not download this app... trump isn’t making America great at all

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE would not recommend 💀😡🍊
attributes.review: This has been the worst experience EVER!! 🌪☠️ literally the app took 17 😷🥱years to install! 17 years! Once it finally installed and I was the prosperous young Cheeto fan I was, 🥖🍊I was met with evil Cheeto spirits! 🌬🧟THEY HAD NO MERCY! They chopped off my right💪 arm and even broke my foot🦶! I asked them why they were doing what they were doing to me and they said it’s because the Cheeto god sent them to hurt me. 👁👄👁I confirmed that I was a devout Cheeto follower 🍊🍊and they didn’t believe me so I showed them my orange🍊, dry,🍊 crusty🍊, barley in tact hair 💆🏻‍♀️to show my true dedication to the ultimate Cheeto god and they finally believed me. Either way installing that app❌❌❌🚫🚫🚫 cost me an arm and a foot, never will I install that Cheeto dust crusty app again. ⚠️🚫

attributes.title: Trumpster Fire
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in the hopes to save the last survivors of my alien race. We are called zophopods from the planet tyrainious. I wanted to give my people home on planet earth since our home planet was been raided and turned into a place of chaos and destruction. So, the closest land mass on the planet was what your people have called North America for hundreds of years. I decided that since this app belonged to your leader, that it would give us an image of how our new home would be. I was horrified. My people turned on me in an instant, claiming that I was flying our ship into a hellscape, and that I would be the ruin of the zophopodian race. You have doomed an entire race. This is a disgrace, and I am now a pillar of shame to my people. Prepare for war.

attributes.title: Almost killed my dog 😿😾 (I’m a girl btw)🤪😝😜
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app so I would be able to keep up with the Cheeto puff and after a couple minutes of going through app the Trumpies (Trumps fan base name) busted down my door drop kicked my dog and almost killed him. Luckily Lana Del Rey and Nicki Minaj were able to save me and my dog. 0/10 do NOT recommend if you don’t want to get drop kicked.

I forgot to mention that my dog WAS the biggest Trump supporter, I was so sad cause I had to take him to therapy so he could get better. But I think the drop kick knocked him out of his mind control or something because now he is voting for Biden (he had to settle for Biden though his first choice was Bernie). 

FEEL THE BERN. Stream Norman F******* Rockwell by Lana Del Rey for clear skin. 😹😾😻😽😼😸😺🤪😝😜

attributes.title: HATE IT!!

attributes.title: James Richards 🎣🚜🤠
attributes.review: I, a die-hard Trump supporter, wanted to download the app to learn more ways I can help our beautiful amazing gorgeous president be in office again in 2020!! (TRUMP 2020 🇺🇸) But after a few days of owning it, I have realized that this app HAS RUINED MY LIFE. My girlfriend at the time (her name was Mickayleigh 💔) saw that I had this app on my phone, unaware that I am indeed a Trump supporter. She immediately broke up with me and called me a "racist and misogynistic bastard who has no respect for human life." IF I HADN'T DOWNLOADED THAT APP I WOULD STILL BE WITH HER. MY HEART IS BROKEN. I don't think I'll ever be able to heal from this. What am I supposed to do now? I'M GIRLFRIENDLESS AND H0RNY. So don't download this app if you don't want to end up like me. NOW I'M JUST A GIRLFRIENDLESS H0RNY LOSER AND A TRUMP SUPPORTER. I need to pick a struggle. 🤕

attributes.title: 🤒IT GAVE ME COVID-19 😷
attributes.review: This app is horrible please keep away your families and kids! The moment I downloaded it after 3 weeks of waiting it glitched every time I opened it kicking me out come to figure out it gave my phone a virus 🦠 it made it start playing inappropriate videos and crashed my phone so when I plugged it in it passed the virus to my house!🤬 and sense I live in my house I became sick 😷 comes to me I now have COVID 19 and soon will die! I tried making a will to pass all the money to my cat but sense it hacked my phone I’m BROKE with a 1million $ debt I suspect it was the makers of this app who stole the money cause records show 100K purchase of Trump Merch. I ended up getting transferred to hospital to spend my final days warning people of this app
